The video was published on Facebook on F: 2021, and has been viewed over 549,000 times and shared over 39,000 times.
The Burmese: language caption in the video claims that the detained president was handcuffed, evoking sadness.
The detained politicians: including Win Myint, have not been photographed in public since the coup on February 1, 2021.
A longer version of the video was found: originally published on the official Facebook page for Myanmar broadcaster Mizzima TV, reporting on Win Myint's election as president on March 28, 2018.
